test_case_title: Add a unique primary email address

locators.python:
class Locators:
    AUTHENTICATE_BUTTON = "role=button[name='Authenticate']"
    USERNAME_TEXTBOX = "role=textbox[name='Username']"
    NEXT_BUTTON = "role=button[name='Next']"
    PASSWORD_TEXTBOX = "role=textbox[name='Password']"
    VERIFY_BUTTON = "role=button[name='Verify']"
    PROFILE_BUTTON = "role=button[name='Profile']"
    PRIMARY_EMAIL_TEXTBOX = "role=textbox[name='* Primary contact email ']"
    UPDATE_BUTTON = "role=button[name='update ']"
    OPTIONS_BUTTON = "role=button[name='Options']"
    LOGOUT_TEXT = "text=Logout"
locators.javascript:
const locators = {
    authenticateButton: "role=button[name='Authenticate']",
    usernameTextbox: "role=textbox[name='Username']",
    nextButton: "role=button[name='Next']",
    passwordTextbox: "role=textbox[name='Password']",
    verifyButton: "role=button[name='Verify']",
    profileButton: "role=button[name='Profile']",
    primaryEmailTextbox: "role=textbox[name='* Primary contact email ']",
    updateButton: "role=button[name='update ']",
    optionsButton: "role=button[name='Options']",
    logoutText: "text=Logout"
};

reusable_functions.python:
async def navigate_to_auth_start(self) -> None:
    """
    Navigate to the authentication start page.
    
    This function navigates the browser to the authentication start page.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Navigating to the authentication start page")
        await self.page.goto('https://junction.welocalize.xyz/auth/start')
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to navigate to auth start: {e}")
        raise

async def click_authenticate(self) -> None:
    """
    Click the authenticate button.
    
    This function clicks the authenticate button on the page.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Clicking the authenticate button")
        await self.page.locator(Locators.AUTHENTICATE_BUTTON).click()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to click authenticate button: {e}")
        raise

async def fill_username(self, username: str) -> None:
    """
    Fill the username textbox.
    
    This function fills the username textbox with the provided username.
    """
    try:
        logger.info(f"Filling username: {username}")
        await self.page.locator(Locators.USERNAME_TEXTBOX).fill(username)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to fill username: {e}")
        raise

async def click_next(self) -> None:
    """
    Click the next button.
    
    This function clicks the next button on the page.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Clicking the next button")
        await self.page.locator(Locators.NEXT_BUTTON).click()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to click next button: {e}")
        raise

async def fill_password(self, password: str) -> None:
    """
    Fill the password textbox.
    
    This function fills the password textbox with the provided password.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Filling password")
        await self.page.locator(Locators.PASSWORD_TEXTBOX).fill(password)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to fill password: {e}")
        raise

async def click_verify(self) -> None:
    """
    Click the verify button.
    
    This function clicks the verify button on the page.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Clicking the verify button")
        await self.page.locator(Locators.VERIFY_BUTTON).click()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to click verify button: {e}")
        raise

async def navigate_to_dashboard(self) -> None:
    """
    Navigate to the vendor portal dashboard.
    
    This function navigates the browser to the vendor portal dashboard.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Navigating to the vendor portal dashboard")
        await self.page.goto('https://junction.welocalize.xyz/vendor-portal/dashboard')
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to navigate to dashboard: {e}")
        raise

async def click_profile(self) -> None:
    """
    Click the profile button.
    
    This function clicks the profile button on the page.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Clicking the profile button")
        await self.page.locator(Locators.PROFILE_BUTTON).click()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to click profile button: {e}")
        raise

async def update_primary_email(self, email: str) -> None:
    """
    Update the primary contact email.
    
    This function updates the primary contact email with the provided email address.
    """
    try:
        logger.info(f"Updating primary email to: {email}")
        await self.page.locator(Locators.PRIMARY_EMAIL_TEXTBOX).fill(email)
        await self.page.locator(Locators.UPDATE_BUTTON).click()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to update primary email: {e}")
        raise

async def click_options_and_logout(self) -> None:
    """
    Click the options button and logout.
    
    This function clicks the options button and then logs out.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Clicking options and logging out")
        await self.page.locator(Locators.OPTIONS_BUTTON).click()
        await self.page.locator(Locators.LOGOUT_TEXT).click()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Failed to logout: {e}")
        raise

test_functions.python:
async def test_add_unique_primary_email(self) -> None:
    """
    Test case for adding a unique primary email address.
    
    This function executes the test case for adding a unique primary email address.
    """
    try:
        logger.info("Starting test case: Add a unique primary email address")
        await self.navigate_to_auth_start()
        await self.click_authenticate()
        await self.fill_username('randomy01@proton.me')
        await self.click_next()
        await self.fill_password('Localize1')
        await self.click_verify()
        await self.navigate_to_dashboard()
        await self.click_profile()
        await self.update_primary_email('ete-unique-100Percentage@proton.me')
        await self.click_options_and_logout()
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Test case failed: {e}")
        raise
